name: Doggoarigato Spherical Cato
description:
Your friend is sad, and while you are a good dog, you are but one small ball of fluff. You need to find more balls of fluff to make your friend happy. Unfortunately, being an excitable Pomeranian you are liable to bark around clusters of cats, and can only move by rolling.

Controls
- Left Mouse Button; Roll in the direction of click
- Right Mouse Button; Throw Yarn. Hold to increase power

For the GMTK2020 Jam. Theme; Out of Control

Developed by Team Crab:
Duncan Saunders,Thomas Tommy Evans , Keith Evans, Jade Konechy

Audio Credits:
"Abyss Flowers", performed by "Antti Luode" Anttisi Instrumentals
